thread.title: WATCH: Acosta scores stunning free kick in CONCACAF Champions League
thread.title_full: WATCH: Acosta scores stunning free kick in CONCACAF Champions League

title: WATCH: Acosta scores stunning free kick in CONCACAF Champions League
text:
0 Mar 15, 2017 9:50:29 PM The midfielder, named in the U.S. national team earlier in the day, celebrated his call up for World Cup qualifiers with stunning free kick. 
This is how you make your boss look smart! 
U.S. rosters answers some questions 
Wednesday afternoon it was announced that U.S. national team boss Bruce Arena had called up F.C. Dallas midfielder Kellyn Acosta to the roster for the team's upcoming World Cup qualifiers, jumping him over other established MLS veterans like Sacha Kljestan and Benny Feilhaber. 
Wednesday night, Acosta made that move look pretty slick with his goal in the CONCACAF Champions League. 
With Dallas playing the first leg of the CCL semifinals at home and level at 1-1 with Mexican club Pachuca, Acosta blasted home a free kick to put Dallas into the lead. â€” CONCACAF (@CONCACAF) March 16, 2017 
Acosta has been on a roll in 2017, scoring four goals in five competitive matches, and Arena will be hoping he can bring that form into the national side, with the USA facing a must-win game against Honduras on March 24. Related
